name: Shooting Targets Or Something, IDK, I've Never Shot Before (Senior Project)
name_original: Shooting Targets Or Something, IDK, I've Never Shot Before (Senior Project)
description:
In this amazing game you can run around an open map shooting targets with a variety of guns to get points!

There are also some hidden things in the map for you to find!

This game was created by me for my 12th grade school project

Click here to watch my video on creating this game! (not uploaded yet!)

Click here to view my YouTube channel!
